query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `honorarios` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `clienteId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `processoId` varchar(64),
  `documentoId` varchar(64),
  `descricao` text NOT NULL,
  `valorTotal` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `valorPago` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
  `valorPendente` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `formaPagamento` enum('avista','parcelado','mensal','exito') NOT NULL,
  `numeroParcelas` int DEFAULT 1,
  `status` enum('pendente','parcial','pago','cancelado') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pendente',
  `dataVencimento` varchar(10),
  `observacoes` text,
  `createdBy` varchar(64),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:

  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `clienteId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `processoId` varchar(64),
  `documentoId` varchar(64),

  `valorTotal` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,

  `formaPagamento` enum('avista','parcelado','mensal','exito') NOT NULL,
  `numeroParcelas` int DEFAULT 1,
  `status` enum('pendente','parcial','pago','cancelado') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pendente',
  `dataVencimento` varchar(10),
  `observacoes` text,
  `createdBy` varchar(64),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
